long_description: Kick back and enjoy a panoramic view in your home away from home in the 3-season Mountain Hardwear Optic 2.5 Tent. Its spacious layout offers 2 or 3 backpackers elbow room for backcountry comfort. Unzip the 2 adjacent doors for a 180deg open-air view when the weather cooperates, or wait out the storm with plenty of room for people and gear. Dual vestibule design creates a dry entry into tent and room for gear storage. DAC Pressfit(R) poles feature a securely fixed, pressed-in ferrule, helping ensure the poles remain strong and reliable. Reflective, color-coded starter tab on the rainfly and canopy makes pitching easy. Internal pockets help keep small items organized and easy to locate.
